page.title: 09Mrs. Peter's Day,Cortachy
page.content: {Thursday 20th June,1985. { After Amanda and Simon left for school,went to work at farm for 2 hours,where I help with housework.Had coffee with farmer's wife.Came home,tidied house,then went to Kirriemuir on my moped to do some shopping.After lunch spent the afternoon in the garden,weeding and planting bedding plants.Now time for my husband to come from his work as a fireman in Dundee.Made tea-fish,chips and curried rice.In the evening, went by car,with next door neighbour to visit his wife,who is at present a patient in Ninewell's Hospital,Dundee.
